hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block First Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Shifting Wall Recovery Heart 2

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #temporal stone within the Deku Tree# contains #the Minuet of Forest#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ After Spinning Log Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Spirit Temple Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Zelda's Lullaby can be used to repair broken signs.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #2# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #2# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Top

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Sun's Song#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Map Room Recovery Heart 1

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Ice Cavern#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Try using various items and weapons on me :)

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #a Game Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #3# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #a Magic Meter#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Right Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Near Scarecrow Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.
